name: Kyoto
description: A city full of ancient temples, traditional tea houses, and stunning cherry blossoms.
bestTimeToVisit: March to May, October to November

name: Santorini
description: A picturesque island with whitewashed buildings, blue-domed churches, and beautiful sunsets.

name: Cape Town
description: A vibrant city surrounded by mountains and ocean, rich in culture and natural beauty.
bestTimeToVisit: March to May, September to November

name: Banff
description: A breathtaking national park in the Rocky Mountains known for its turquoise lakes and wildlife.
bestTimeToVisit: June to August, December to March for skiing

name: Petra
description: An archaeological wonder carved into rose-colored cliffs, once a thriving ancient city.
bestTimeToVisit: March to May, September to November

name: Reykjavik
description: A small but vibrant capital surrounded by volcanoes, geysers, and hot springs.
bestTimeToVisit: June to August for mild weather, September to April for Northern Lights

name: Machu Picchu
description: A mysterious Incan citadel high in the Andes, known for its dramatic setting and stonework.

name: Queenstown
description: A hub for adventure sports and stunning natural landscapes on the shores of Lake Wakatipu.
bestTimeToVisit: December to February for summer activities, June to August for skiing

name: Marrakech
description: A sensory-rich city filled with colorful markets, spices, and historical palaces.
bestTimeToVisit: March to May, September to November

name: Paris
description: The city of love, known for its art, fashion, food, and iconic landmarks.
bestTimeToVisit: April to June, September to October
